game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.description: Thelocal merchant's daughter had her prized necklace stolen, and the police are unable to find any leads. The merchant is offering a substantial reward for its safe return.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and the gratitude of the merchant

task.objective: Investigate the scene of the crime
task.description: Talk to the locals and gather information about the theft
task.location: The merchant's shop in the town square

task.objective: Follow the lead on the suspicious stranger
task.description: Infiltrate the stranger's hideout and gather evidence of their involvement
task.location: The abandoned warehouse on the outskirts of town

task.objective: Confront the thief and recover the heirloom
task.description: Use your skills to apprehend the thief and retrieve the stolen item
task.location: The thief's lair in the nearby forest
